Record.ClassificationPath: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Genetic Diseases, Inborn/Genetic Diseases, Y-Linked
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: Genetic diseases that are linked to mutant ALLELES on the Y CHROMOSOME in humans (Y CHROMOSOME, HUMAN) or the Y chromosome in other species. Included here are animal models of human Y-linked diseases.
